episodes.title: The Teacher’s Experiment | The Cult That Lost Its Faith
episodes.description:
He promised peace, purity, and purpose — and millions believed him.

But inside the high walls of his ashram, faith turned into fear.

The Teacher’s Experiment is a dramatized account based on verified legal proceedings and investigative journalism surrounding the Dera Sacha Sauda case.

All dialogues and personal moments are fictionalized to preserve sensitivity while retaining factual accuracy.

🎧 If you love deep, intelligent crime stories that explore why people believe in illusions or crimes or crazy, follow The Psychology of Crimes. 

New episodes every week — true stories that reveal the human mind behind deception. 

Hashtags: #TrueCrime #PsychologicalCrime #FaithAndDeception
